title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 platform uses Class.forName() method.
EB: The BidiUtil class should have a private constructor to prevent instantiation since there are no nonstatic methods in this class.
SR: To reproduce the bug, try to instantiate the BidiUtil class in the win32 platform.
